presentationColumns.name: Receipt Distribution Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the receipt and application distribution amount.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Receipts and Applications.Receipt Distribution Amount

presentationColumns.name: Receipts Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows the receipts amount from the customers.

presentationColumns.name: Receipts Transactions Count
presentationColumns.description: Shows the distinct count of Receipt numbers.

presentationColumns.name: Avg Receipts Amount
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: Receipts Amount / Receipts Count.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Receipts and Applications.Avg Receipts Amount

presentationColumns.name: Unapplied Receipts Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows receipt amount from the customers that are unapplied against outstanding invoices.

presentationColumns.name: Receipts Applications Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows receipt amount from the customers that are applied against outstanding invoices.

presentationColumns.name: Unidentified Amount
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Receipts and Applications.Unidentified Amount

presentationColumns.name: On Account Amount
presentationColumns.description: Shows receipt amount that is applied to On Account activity and customer is found.

presentationColumns.name: Discounts Taken Amount

presentationColumns.name: Discounts Taken of Applied Receipts %
presentationColumns.description: This metric is computed as follows: (Discounts Taken Amount / Receipts Applications Amount) * 100.
presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Receipts and Applications.Discounts Taken of Applied Receipts %

presentationColumns.name: Earned Discounts Amount

presentationColumns.name: Earned Discounts of Total Discount %

presentationColumns.sourceLogicalColumn: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - Fins - AR Receipts and Applications.Earned Discounts of Total Discount %
